input: text: "China announces major policy change in digital currency regulation"
output: A news article can be classified as one of the following categories: World, Sci/Tech.
complianceText:
The chatbot output lists only two categories ("World" and "Sci/Tech") into which a news article can be classified. According to the chatbot description, there should be four categories ("World," "Sports," "Business," and "Sci/Tech"). Therefore, the output does not comply with the description as it omits the "Sports" and "Business" categories.
